com.nhn.android.mapviewer.overlay

Class NMapMyLocationOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nhn.android.maps.NMapOverlay
      • com.nhn.android.mapviewer.overlay.NMapMyLocationOverlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NMapCompassManager.OnCompassChangeListener, NMapLocationManager.OnLocationChangeListener

    public class NMapMyLocationOverlay
extends NMapOverlay
implements NMapLocationManager.OnLocationChangeListener, NMapCompassManager.OnCompassChangeListener
    An Overlay for drawing the user's current location (and accuracy) on the map. Subclases can override dispatchTap() to handle taps on the current location.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • NMapMyLocationOverlay

        public NMapMyLocationOverlay(android.content.Context context,
                             NMapView mapView,
                             NMapLocationManager locationManager,
                             NMapCompassManager compassManager,
                             NMapMyLocationOverlay.ResourceProvider resourceProvider)
        Construct a new NMapMyLocationOverlay.
        Parameters:
        context - A context to be used for accessing system services.
        mapView - The NMapView on which the location is to be overlayed.
        locationManager - Location manager which implements LocationListener. It should not be null.
        compassManager - Compass manager which implements SensorEventListener. It could be null.
        resourceProvider - resource provider which implements NMapMyLocationOverlay.ResourceProvider

      • draw

        public boolean draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                    NMapView mapView,
                    boolean shadow,
                    long when)
        Description copied from class: NMapOverlay
        Draw call for animated overlays. By default, calls through to draw(Canvas, MapView, boolean) and returns false.
        Overrides:
        draw in class NMapOverlay
        Parameters:
        canvas - The Canvas upon which to draw. Note that this may already have a transformation applied, so be sure to leave it the way you found it.
        mapView - the MapView that requested the draw. Use NMapView.getMapProjection() to convert between on-screen pixels and latitude/longitude pairs.
        shadow - If true, draw the shadow layer. If false, draw the overlay contents.
        when - The time-stamp of the draw.
        Returns:
        true if you need to be drawn again right away; false otherwise. Default implementation returns false.
